Scene:
The Otowa Hill
(Otowayama / 音羽山)

Play: The Nunobiki Waterfall (源平布引滝)

Production: November 1970

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Oritayū V (see also Takemoto Tsunatayū IX) (竹本織大夫 (五))



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Enza V (鶴澤燕三 (五))
